verses.verse: Behold,<WH935> there came a man<WH376> of God<WH430> out of Judah<WH3063> by the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> to Beth El:<WH1008> and Jeroboam<WH3379> was standing<WH5975> by the altar<WH4196> to burn incense.<WH6999>

He gave<WH5414> a sign<WH4159> the same day,<WH3117> saying,<WH559> "This is the sign<WH4159> which Yahweh<WH3068> has spoken:<WH1696> Behold,<WH4196> the altar will be split<WH7167> apart,<WH1880> and the ashes that are on it will be poured out.<WH8210>"

It happened,<WH4428> when the king heard<WH8085> the saying<WH1697> of the man<WH376> of God,<WH430> which he cried<WH7121> against the altar<WH4196> in Bethel,<WH1008> that Jeroboam<WH3379> put out<WH7971> his hand<WH3027> from the altar,<WH4196> saying,<WH559> "Seize<WH8610> him!<WH3027>" His hand, which he put out<WH7971> against him,<WH3001> dried up, so that he could<WH3201> not draw it back again to himself.<WH7725>

The altar<WH4196> also was split<WH7167> apart,<WH1880> and the ashes poured out<WH8210> from the altar,<WH4196> according to the sign<WH4159> which the man<WH376> of God<WH430> had given<WH5414> by the word<WH1697> of Yahweh.<WH3068>

The king<WH4428> answered<WH6030> the<WH559> man<WH376> of God,<WH430> "Now entreat<WH2470> the favor<WH6440> of Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and pray<WH2470> for me,<WH3027> that my hand may be restored me again.<WH7725>" The man<WH376> of God<WH430> entreated<WH2470> Yahweh,<WH3068> and the king<WH4428>'s hand<WH3027> was restored him again,<WH7725> and became as it was before.<WH7223>
The king<WH4428> said<WH1696> to the man<WH376> of God,<WH430> "Come<WH935> home<WH1004> with me,<WH5582> and refresh yourself,<WH5414> and I will give you a reward.<WH4991>"

The man<WH376> of God<WH430> said<WH559> to the king,<WH4428> "Even if you gave<WH5414> me half<WH2677> of your house,<WH1004> I would not go in<WH935> with you,<WH398> neither would I eat bread<WH3899> nor drink<WH8354> water<WH4325> in this place;<WH4725>

for so was it commanded<WH6680> me by the word<WH1697> of Yahweh,<WH3068> saying,<WH559> <WH398> 'You shall eat no bread,<WH3899> nor drink<WH8354> water,<WH4325> neither return<WH7725> by the way<WH1870> that you came.<WH1980>'"
So he went<WH3212> another<WH312> way,<WH1870> and didn't<WH7725> return by the way<WH1870> that he came<WH935> to Bethel.<WH1008>

Now there lived<WH3427> an<WH259> old<WH2205> prophet<WH5030> in Bethel;<WH1008> and one of his sons<WH1121> came<WH935> and told<WH5608> him all the works<WH4639> that the man<WH376> of God<WH430> had done<WH6213> that day<WH3117> in Bethel.<WH1008> They also told<WH1696> their father<WH4428> the words<WH1697> which he had spoken<WH5608> to the king.<WH1>

Their father<WH1> said<WH1696> to them,<WH1870> "Which way did he go?<WH1980>" Now his sons<WH1121> had seen<WH7200> which<WH335> way<WH1870> the man<WH376> of God<WH430> went,<WH1980> who came<WH935> from Judah.<WH3063>
He said<WH559> to his sons,<WH1121> "Saddle<WH2280> the donkey<WH2543> for me.<WH2280>" So they saddled the donkey<WH2543> for him;<WH7392> and he rode on it.

He went<WH3212> after<WH310> the man<WH376> of God,<WH430> and found<WH4672> him sitting<WH3427> under an oak.<WH424> He said<WH559> to him,<WH376> "Are you the man of God<WH430> who came<WH935> from Judah?<WH3063>" He said,<WH559> "I am."
Then he said<WH559> to him,<WH3212> "Come home<WH1004> with me,<WH398> and eat bread.<WH3899>"
He said,<WH559> "I may<WH3201> not return<WH7725> with you,<WH935> nor go in with you;<WH398> neither will I eat bread<WH3899> nor drink<WH8354> water<WH4325> with you in this place.<WH4725>

For it was said<WH1697> to me by the word<WH1697> of Yahweh,<WH3068> <WH398> 'You shall eat no bread<WH3899> nor drink<WH8354> water<WH4325> there,<WH7725> nor turn again to go<WH3212> by the way<WH1870> that you came.<WH1980>'"

He said<WH559> to him,<WH5030> "I also am a prophet as you are;<WH4397> and an angel spoke<WH1696> to me by the word<WH1697> of Yahweh,<WH3068> saying,<WH559> <WH7725> 'Bring him back with you into your house,<WH1004> that he may eat<WH398> bread<WH3899> and drink<WH8354> water.<WH4325>'" He lied to him.<WH3584>
So he went back<WH7725> with him,<WH398> and ate bread<WH3899> in his house,<WH1004> and drank<WH8354> water.<WH4325>
It happened,<WH3427> as they sat at the table,<WH7979> that the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to the prophet<WH5030> who brought him back;<WH7725>

and he cried<WH7121> to the man<WH376> of God<WH430> who came<WH935> from Judah,<WH3063> saying,<WH559> "Thus says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> <WH3282> 'Because you have been disobedient<WH4784> to the mouth<WH6310> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and have not kept<WH8104> the commandment<WH4687> which Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> commanded you,<WH6680>

but came back,<WH7725> and have eaten<WH398> bread<WH3899> and drunk<WH8354> water<WH4325> in the place<WH4725> of which he said<WH1696> to you,<WH398> "Eat no bread,<WH3899> and drink<WH8354> no water;<WH4325>" your body<WH5038> shall not come<WH935> to the tomb<WH6913> of your fathers.<WH1>'"

It happened,<WH310> after he had eaten<WH398> bread,<WH3899> and after<WH310> he had drunk,<WH8354> that he saddled<WH2280> the donkey<WH2543> for the prophet<WH5030> whom he had brought back.<WH7725>

When he had gone,<WH3212> a lion<WH738> met<WH4672> him by the way,<WH1870> and killed<WH4191> him.<WH5038> His body was cast<WH7993> in the way,<WH1870> and the donkey<WH2543> stood<WH5975> by<WH681> it.<WH738> The lion also stood<WH5975> by the body.<WH5038>

Behold,<WH582> men passed by,<WH5674> and saw<WH7200> the body<WH5038> cast<WH7993> in the way,<WH1870> and the lion<WH738> standing<WH5975> by<WH681> the body;<WH5038> and they came<WH935> and told<WH1696> it in the city<WH5892> where the old<WH2205> prophet<WH5030> lived.<WH3427>

When the prophet<WH5030> who brought him back<WH7725> from the way<WH1870> heard<WH8085> of it,<WH559> he said, "It is the man<WH376> of God<WH430> who was disobedient<WH4784> to the mouth<WH6310> of Yahweh.<WH3068> Therefore Yahweh<WH3068> has delivered<WH5414> him to the lion,<WH738> which has mauled<WH7665> him and slain<WH4191> him,<WH1697> according to the word of Yahweh,<WH3068> which he spoke to him.<WH1696>"
He spoke<WH1696> to his sons,<WH1121> saying,<WH559> "Saddle<WH2280> the donkey<WH2543> for me.<WH2280>" They saddled it.

He went<WH3212> and found<WH4672> his body<WH5038> cast<WH7993> in the way,<WH1870> and the donkey<WH2543> and the lion<WH738> standing<WH5975> by<WH681> the body.<WH5038> The lion<WH738> had not eaten<WH398> the body,<WH5038> nor mauled<WH7665> the donkey.<WH2543>

The prophet<WH5030> took up<WH5375> the body<WH5038> of the man<WH376> of God,<WH430> and laid<WH3240> it on the donkey,<WH2543> and brought it back.<WH7725> He came<WH935> to the city<WH5892> of the old<WH2205> prophet<WH5030> to mourn,<WH5594> and to bury him.<WH6912>
He laid<WH3240> his body<WH5038> in his own grave;<WH6913> and they mourned<WH5594> over him,<WH1945> saying, "Alas, my brother!<WH251>"

It happened,<WH310> after he had buried<WH6912> him,<WH559> that he spoke to his sons,<WH1121> saying,<WH559> "When I am dead,<WH4191> then bury<WH6912> me in the tomb<WH6913> in which the man<WH376> of God<WH430> is buried.<WH6912> Lay<WH3240> my bones<WH6106> beside<WH681> his bones.<WH6106>

For the saying<WH1697> which he cried<WH7121> by the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> against the altar<WH4196> in Bethel,<WH1008> and against all the houses<WH1004> of the high places<WH1116> which are in the cities<WH5892> of Samaria,<WH8111> will surely happen."

After<WH310> this thing<WH1697> Jeroboam<WH3379> didn't<WH7725> return from his evil<WH7451> way,<WH1870> but again<WH7725> made<WH6213> priests<WH3548> of the high places<WH1116> from among all<WH7098> the people.<WH5971> Whoever wanted<WH2655> to,<WH4390> he consecrated him,<WH3548> that there might be priests of the high places.<WH1116>
This thing<WH1697> became sin<WH2403> to the house<WH1004> of Jeroboam,<WH3379> even to cut it off,<WH3582> and to destroy<WH8045> it from off the surface<WH6440> of the earth.<WH127>
